attributes.action: Vaccinate high-risk groups globally before you vaccinate all adults in the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
It is clearly morally the right thing to do, but it’s also economically the right thing to do.

Let’s stop a move towards protectionist policies and attitudes. It’s a short term policy. And it will harm us all.
attributes.background: Boris. I’m a UK adult who asks that once we’ve vaccinated high-risk groups (and healthcare workers) in the UK, please ensure that the supply of Covid vaccines is provided to other high-risk groups around the world before you vaccinate me. We’re in this together. Me. You. And the world.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572802
